member.name: M:NKit.Data.DB.LINQ.LinqFunnelContextWindows.Save``1(``0,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Saves (updates/inserts) an entity to the table corrseponding to the entity type. If the entity's surrogate key is an identity entity will be inserted and not updated.
member.typeparam: The type of the entity i.e. which table it will be saved to.
member.param: The the entity to save.
member.returns: Returns a list of change results i.e. what entities where updated

member.param: The the entity to save.

member.name: M:NKit.Data.DB.LINQ.LinqFunnelContextWindows.GetEntitySurrogateKey``1
member.summary: Determines the primary key of an entity type. The first primary key found on the entity type i.e. the assumption is made that the entity type only has one primary key, which is the surrogate key.
member.typeparam: The entity type i.e. the table whose surrogate key needs to be determined.
member.returns: Retruns the PropertyInfo corresponding to the column which is the surrogate key for the specified entity type.

member.name: M:NKit.Data.DB.LINQ.LinqFunnelContextWindows.UpdateOriginalEntity``1(``0,``0,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates the original entity with values of the latest entities. In other words, it copies the column values of the latest entity to the original entity.
member.typeparam: The entity type i.e. the table whose original record will be updated.
member.param: The original entity retrieved from the database.
The latest entity received from the client.
member.returns: Returns a list of change results containing all the fields that were changed and their original and new values.

member.summary: Updates the original entity with values of the latest entities. In other words, it copies the column values of the latest entity to the original entity.

The latest entity received from the client.
member.returns: Returns a list of change results containing all the fields that were changed and their original and new values.

member.name: M:NKit.Data.DB.LINQ.LinqFunnelContextWindows.GetLinqToSqlChangeConflictErrorMessage(System.Data.Linq.DataContext)
member.summary: Searches through all changes that caused a concurrency conflict in the DataContext and compiles an error message listing all the conflicts on all tables and each member (field) that caused the conflicts. This method should be called after having called SubmitChanges on a DataContext and where a ChangeConflictException has occured.

member.name: T:NKit.Data.ORM.OrmAssembly
member.summary: http://olondono.blogspot.com/2008/02/creating-code-at-runtime.html Collectible Assemblies for Dynamic Type Generation : http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dd554932.aspx#restrictions

member.name: M:NKit.Data.ORM.OrmAssembly.GetAssemblyFilePathToExecutingDirectory
member.summary: Gets the default assembly file path which is the assembly file name in the current executing directory.

member.name: M:NKit.Data.ORM.OrmAssembly.SaveOrmAssemblyToExecutingDirectory
member.summary: We can only save the assembly in the current directory when we call save i.e. we're not allowed to set a path. However, the current directory may not always be equal to current directory. If that's the case we need to save it to the current directory, then copy it to the executing directory and thereafter delete it from the current directory.

member.name: M:NKit.Data.ORM.OrmAssembly.Save(System.String)
member.summary: Saves the assembly in the executing directory and then copies it to the specified output directory if the output directory is different from the executing directory. Throws an exception of the specified output directory does not exist.

member.name: M:NKit.Data.ORM.OrmAssembly.ToString
member.summary: Gets the assembly file name.

member.summary: http://olondono.blogspot.com/2008/02/creating-code-at-runtime.html

member.summary: A wrapper class for managing RAS connections e.g. VPN or dial up connections.

member.name: M:NKit.Utilities.RAS.RasConnectionManagerWindows.#ctor
member.summary: Utility class for managing windows connections e.g. VPN or dial up connections.

member.summary: Utility class for managing windows connections e.g. VPN or dial up connections.

member.summary: Event fired when the state of the a windows connection changes.

member.summary: Event fired after a dial up connection has been completed.

member.name: M:NKit.Utilities.RAS.RasConnectionManagerWindows.CreateVPNConnectionEntry(System.String,System.Nullable{DotRas.RasVpnStrategy},System.Nullable{DotRas.RasDeviceType},System.String)
member.summary: Creates a VPN connection in the Windows list of connections.
member.param: The name of the VPN connection to create.
The VPN strategy to use. If null the default strategy is used.
The RAS (Remote Access Serice) device type. If null the default is used i.e.RasDeviceType.Vpn
The name of the RAS device. If null the default is used i.e. "(PPTP)".

member.summary: Creates a dial-up connection in the windows list of connections.
member.param: The name of the dial-up connection to create.
The phone number to be dialed when dialing the dial-up connection.
The RAS (Remote Access Serice) device type. If null the default is used i.e.RasDeviceType.Modem
The name of the RAS device. May not be null.

member.name: M:NKit.Utilities.RAS.RasConnectionManagerWindows.GetDevices
member.summary: Gets a list of RAS devices available e.g. modems, VPN connections etc.

member.summary: Finds the RAS connection (VPN or dial up) and asynchronously dials that connection.
member.param: The name of the RAS connection e.g. MyCompanyVPN
The username to specify when dialing.
The password to specify when dialing.
Length of time until asynchronous dialing times out..
The type of phone book e.g. current user or all users.

member.summary: Disconnects a RAS connection.

member.name: E:NKit.Utilities.SMS.SmsGatewayWindows.OnSmsReceived
member.summary: Event fired when an SMS is received by the SMS Gateway.

member.name: M:NKit.Utilities.SMS.SmsGatewayWindows.ParseSmsReceivedNotificationMessageLine(System.String)
member.summary: This method handles what happens when the modem notifies the PC when an SMS has arrived and is sitting in a specific memory bank on the SIM card. After parsing the line containing memory bank details it then requests the modem to retrieve and write out the SMS details and message to the serial port, which will then be handled by the HandleSmsDetailsMessageLines method.
member.param: The line containing the infor on which memory bank the SMS is on.

member.name: M:NKit.Utilities.SMS.SmsGatewayWindows.ParseSmsDetailsMessageLines(System.String,System.String[],System.Int32)
member.summary: This method handles the parsing of the actual SMS that was retrieved from a specific memory bank on the SIM card.

member.name: M:NKit.Utilities.SMS.SmsGatewayWindows.ClearSimMemoryBank(System.Int32)
member.summary: Clears a memory bank of the SIM card. This should be done after an SMS has been read off a memory bank and has been handled.

member.name: M:NKit.Utilities.SMS.SmsGatewayWindows.GetDateTimeFromSmsDateTime(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Parses a date sent by the modem to a .NET DateTime.
member.param: The received date of the SMS given by the modem expected in this format: "13/11/01,20:18:59+08"
Whether to strip the timezone from the given date time i.e. not compare the provided time zone in the date time with the time zone of this machine where the code is running on.

member.name: M:NKit.Utilities.SMS.SmsGatewayWindows.ConfigureModemForNotificationResponseToPC
member.summary: Configures the modem to send notifications to the PC when an SMS is received. Notifications containing info on the memory bank of the SIM card where the SMS is stored. These notifications will be read by this SmsGateway from a specific memory bank of the SIM card.

member.name: M:NKit.Utilities.SMS.SmsGatewayWindows.SendSms(NKit.Utilities.SMS.SmsInfoWindows)
member.summary: Sends a command to the modem informing it to send an SMS to a specific cell phone number.
member.param: The details of the SMS to send.

member.summary: Cab Wizard: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa924359.aspx
member.returns: Returns the contents of CabWiz's log file.

member.name: T:NKit.Utilities.Cab.CabInfoWindows
member.summary: Contains information about a CAB file in order to create a INF file to be passed to cabwiz to build a cab. INF format: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa924478.aspx Creating an INF File: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/3h8ff753(v=vs.80).aspx

member.name: M:NKit.Utilities.Cab.CabInfoWindows.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Double},System.Nullable{System.Double})
member.summary: Contains information about a CAB file in order to create a INF file to be passed to cabwiz to build a cab.
member.param: May not be passed as null or empty.
May not be passed as null or empty.
May not be passed as null or empty.
A null defaults the value to 4.0
A null defaults the value to 6.99

member.name: M:NKit.Utilities.Cab.CabInfoWindows.#ctor
member.summary: Contains information about a CAB file in order to create a INF file to be passed to cabwiz to build a cab.

member.name: P:NKit.Utilities.Cab.CabInfoWindows.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Get a CAB resource file with the specified file name (not the full path).

member.name: M:NKit.Utilities.Cab.CabInfoWindows.SetCESetupDll(System.String)
member.summary: Set the file name (not the path) of the CESetupDLL for the CAB file. The resource file must have already been added to this CAB and must have a dll file extension.

member.name: M:NKit.Utilities.Cab.CabInfoWindows.ContainsCabResource(System.String)
member.summary: Pass in just the file name (not the path) to determine if the resource file has already been added to be embedded into this CAB file.

member.name: M:NKit.Utilities.Cab.CabInfoWindows.ContainsCabResource(NKit.Utilities.Cab.CabResourceInfoWindows)
member.summary: Pass in CabResource to determine if the resource file has already been added to be embedded into this CAB file. The match is done against the file name (not th path).

member.name: M:NKit.Utilities.Cab.CabInfoWindows.AddCabResource(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a file as a resource to be embedded in the CAB file. The file name (not the path) has to be unique to this CAB file.

member.name: M:NKit.Utilities.Cab.CabInfoWindows.RemoveCabResource(NKit.Utilities.Cab.CabResourceInfoWindows)
member.summary: Removes a resource file from this CAB file.

member.name: M:NKit.Utilities.Cab.CabInfoWindows.ValidateCabResourcesExist
member.summary: Validates that all the files resources added to the CAB actually exist.

member.name: M:NKit.Utilities.Cab.CabResourceInfoWindows.GetINFCopyFileOperationName
member.summary:
Gets just the name of the operation in the INF file responsible for copying the file to the correct location on the device. e.g. (where 1 is the index of the file)
Files.Common1

member.name: M:NKit.Utilities.Cab.CabResourceInfoWindows.AppendINFSourceDiskNameBlock(System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.summary:
Gets the directory path formatted as needed to be listed the INF file. e.g. (where 1 is the index and C:\Program Files\Microsoft.NET\SDK\CompactFramework\v3.5\WindowsCE\ is the directory of the file)
1=,"Common1",,"C:\Program Files\Microsoft.NET\SDK\CompactFramework\v3.5\WindowsCE\"

member.name: M:NKit.Utilities.Cab.CabResourceInfoWindows.AppendINFSourceDiskFileBlock(System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.summary:
Gets the file name formatted as needed to be listed in the INF file. e.g. (where 1 is the index and NETCFv35.wm.armv4i.cab is the file name.
"NETCFv35.wm.armv4i.cab"=1

member.name: M:NKit.Utilities.Cab.CabResourceInfoWindows.AppendINFDestinationDirBlock(System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.summary:
Get the INF formatted line indicating the destination directory on the device where the file will be copied to. e.g. (where 1 is the index)
Files.Common1=0,"%InstallDir%"

member.name: M:NKit.Utilities.Cab.CabResourceInfoWindows.AppendINFCopyFileOperationBlock(System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.summary:
Get the actual operation in the INF file responsible for copying the file to the correct location on the device. e.g. (where 1 is the index and NETCFv35.wm.armv4i.cab is the file name)
[Files.Common1] "NETCFv35.wm.armv4i.cab","NETCFv35.wm.armv4i.cab",,0
